price: যাৰ সমতুল্য (জাতি) কোনো দেশতে সৃষ্টি কৰা হোৱা নাই;
arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: allatī lam yukh'laq mith'luhā fī al-bilādi
